post.description: Generate images in response to the given request.
Generate images in response to the given request.
Generate images in response to the given request.
Generate images in response to the given request.
Generate images in response to the given request.

Backwards-compatible API for pre-vertical Stable Diffusion XL images.

Note that this endpoint assumes SDXL - there is no support for SD 1.5.

get.description:
Respond that the server is healthy.

All our setup is done in the lifespan manager prior to yielding,
so by the time FastAPI starts taking any requests at all, we are
by construction ready to handle them.

Engine.title: Engine
Engine.description: The model engines available for image generation.

ImageEncoding.title: ImageEncoding
ImageEncoding.description: The image encoding types available for image generation response.

image_b64.title: Image in Base64
image_b64.description: The generated image or None if it was removed for safety.

removed_for_safety.title: Removed For Safety
removed_for_safety.description: True if the image was removed for safety, False otherwise.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Seed used to generate the image. It can be used to recreate the generation.

prompt.title: Input Prompt
prompt.description: Text describing the image content to generate.
prompt.example: An octopus playing chess, masterpiece, photorealistic

prompt_2.title: Second Input Prompt
prompt_2.description: Text with a high-level description of the image to generate. Used only by SD XL.
prompt_2.example: A painting of a cute cat wearing a hat

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Text describing image traits to avoid during generation.

negative_prompt_2.title: Second Negative Prompt
negative_prompt_2.description: Text with a high level description of things to avoid during generation. Used only by SD XL.

checkpoint.title: Checkpoint
checkpoint.description: Custom checkpoint to be used during image generation.

controlnet.title: ControlNet
controlnet.description: ControlNet to be used during image generation

vae.title: VAE
vae.description: Custom VAE to be used during image generation.

textual_inversions.title: Dictionary of Textual Inversions
textual_inversions.description: A dictionary of textual inversions to be used during image generation. Textual inversions as keys and trigger words as values.

loras.title: Dictionary of LoRAs
loras.description: A dictionary of LoRAs to apply. LoRAs as keys and their weights (float) as values.

sampler.title: Sampler Name
sampler.description: Sampler name (also known as 'scheduler') to use during image generation.

cfg_scale.title: Classifier-free Guidance Scale
cfg_scale.description: Floating-point number represeting how closely to adhere to prompt description. Must be a positive number no greater than 50.0.

steps.title: Number of Steps
steps.description: Integer repreenting how many steps of diffusion to run. Must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 200.

num_images.title: Number of Output Images
num_images.description: Integer representing how many output images to generate with a single prompt/configuration.

seed.title: Fixed Random Seed
seed.description: Integer number or list of integers representing the seeds of random generators. Fixing random seed is useful when attempting to generate a specific image. Must be greater than 0 and less than 2^32.

controlnet_image.title: ControlNet Image
controlnet_image.description: Controlnet image encoded in b64 string for guiding image generation. Required for controlnet engines.

init_image.title: Initial Image
init_image.description: Starting point image encoded in b64 string for Image to Image generation mode.

mask_image.title: Mask Image
mask_image.description: b64 encoded mask image for inpainting. White area should indicate where to paint.

strength.title: Strength
strength.description: Floating-point number indicating how much creative the Image to Image generation mode should be. Must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 1.0.

style_preset.title: Pre-defined Styles
style_preset.description: Pre-defined styles used to guide the output image towards a particular style. Pre-defined styles are only supported by SDXL.

use_refiner.title: Use Refiner
use_refiner.description: Whether to enable and apply the SDXL refiner model to the image generation.

high_noise_frac.title: High Noise Fraction
high_noise_frac.description: Floating-point number that defines the fraction of steps to perform with the base model. Used only by SD XL. Must be greater than or equal to 0.0 and less than or equal to 1.0.

controlnet_conditioning_scale.title: ControlNet Scale
controlnet_conditioning_scale.description: How strong the effect of the controlnet should be.

controlnet_preprocess.title: ControlNet Preprocessing
controlnet_preprocess.description: Whether to apply automatic ControlNet preprocessing.

clip_skip.title: Clip Skip
clip_skip.description: Optionally skip later layers of the text encoder. Higher values lead to more abstract interpretations of the prompt.

image_encoding.title: Output Image Encoding
image_encoding.description: Define which encoding process should be applied before returning the generated image(s).

ImageGenerationRequest.title: ImageGenerationRequest
ImageGenerationRequest.description: Generate one or more images based on the given parameters.

images.title: Images
images.description: List of ImageGeneration(s) generated by the request.

prediction_time_ms.title: Prediction Time (ms)
prediction_time_ms.description: Total runtime of the image generation(s).

prompt.title: Describes the image to generate.
prompt.example: An octopus playing chess, masterpiece, photorealistic

prompt_2.title: High level description of the image to generate.
prompt_2.example: A painting of a cute cat wearing a hat

negative_prompt.title: Description of image traits to avoid

negative_prompt_2.title: High level description of things to avoid during generation

model.title: Which model to use for inference

loras.title: A dictionary of lora updates to apply and their weight.

sampler.title: Scheduler to use when generating image

cfg_scale.title: How closely to adhere to prompt description

steps.title: How many steps of diffusion to run

seed.title: Fixed random seed, useful when attempting to generate a specific image

strength.title: How much creative to be in img2img mode

style_preset.title: Used to guide the output image towards a particular style

use_refiner.title: Whether to apply the sdxl refiner

high_noise_frac.title: Which fraction of steps to perform with the base model

output_type.title: Type of image to return, should be one of jpg, jpeg or png.

replica.title: Name of the replica this model is running on

seed.title: Seed used for generation, useful for replicating results

removed_for_safety.title: A list indicating whether each returned image was filtered for safety or not.

Scheduler.title: Scheduler
Scheduler.description: The schedulers available for image generation.
